angstd.ui.workspace
Class WorkspaceTreeModel

java.lang.Object
  angstd.ui.workspace.WorkspaceTreeModel
All Implemented Interfaces:
WorkspaceChangeListener, java.util.EventListener, javax.swing.tree.TreeModel
public class WorkspaceTreeModel
extends java.lang.Object
implements javax.swing.tree.TreeModel, WorkspaceChangeListener

TreeModel for the workspace tree. Represents the hierarchical structure of the given workspace.

The given workspace is used as root and the WorkspaceElement structure is resolved by the model.

Whenever changes occur within the workspace this TreeModel is notfied. To ensure this its added as listener to the Workspace.

Author:
Andreas Held
